com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.common.dao

Interface CloudDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateDao<T>, CrudDao<T>, DeleteDao<T>, ModelDao<T>, ModelListDao<T,U>, ReadDao<T>, UpdateDao<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCampaignDeviceMetadataDao, AbstractCampaignStatisticsDao, AbstractCampaignStatisticsEventsDao, AbstractCampaignStatisticsListDao, AbstractCertificateIssuerDao, AbstractCloudDao, AbstractDeviceEnrollmentBulkCreateDao, AbstractDeviceEnrollmentBulkDeleteDao, AbstractDeviceEnrollmentDenialDao, AbstractFirmwareImageDao, AbstractFirmwareManifestDao, AbstractModelDao, AbstractModelListDao, AbstractPreSharedKeyDao, AbstractSubtenantApiKeyDao, AbstractSubtenantTrustedCertificateDao, AbstractSubtenantUserDao, AbstractSubtenantUserInvitationDao, AccountDao, AccountListDao, ApiKeyDao, ApiKeyListDao, CampaignDeviceMetadataDao, CampaignStatisticsDao, CampaignStatisticsEventsDao, CampaignStatisticsListDao, CertificateEnrollmentDao, CertificateEnrollmentListDao, CertificateIssuerConfigDao, CertificateIssuerConfigListDao, CertificateIssuerDao, CertificateIssuerListDao, DeveloperCertificateDao, DeviceDao, DeviceEnrollmentBulkCreateDao, DeviceEnrollmentBulkDeleteDao, DeviceEnrollmentDao, DeviceEnrollmentDenialDao, DeviceEnrollmentDenialListDao, DeviceEnrollmentListDao, DeviceEventsDao, DeviceEventsListDao, DeviceListDao, FirmwareImageDao, FirmwareImageListDao, FirmwareManifestDao, FirmwareManifestListDao, PreSharedKeyDao, PreSharedKeyListDao, ServerCredentialsDao, SubtenantApiKeyDao, SubtenantTrustedCertificateDao, SubtenantUserDao, SubtenantUserInvitationDao, TrustedCertificateDao, TrustedCertificateListDao, UpdateCampaignDao, UpdateCampaignListDao, UserDao, UserInvitationDao, UserInvitationListDao, UserListDao

    @Preamble(description="Generic DAO definition")
public interface CloudDao
extends java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Closeable
    Generic Data Access Object (DAO) definition for interacting with the Cloud.

        throws MbedCloudException

      • configure

        void configure(@Nullable
               ConnectionOptions options)
        throws MbedCloudException
        Sets cloud connection configuration.

        Defines how to access the Cloud.

        Parameters:
        options - connection configuration
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process.

      • configure

        void configure(@NonNull
               ApiClientWrapper client)
        throws MbedCloudException
        Sets cloud client.

        Defines how to access the Cloud using a specific client.

        Parameters:
        client - client to use
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurs during the process.
